comments.body: The reason why I don't like initials beside `TODO`s is that `git blame` works better and initials tend to become irrelevant over time.
I find them useful pretty frequently. Yes `git blame` works but it’s an extra step, it’s annoying to track it across refactorings and so on.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +190,194 @@    detectModuleCollisions(prefixes, interfaces)

    // TODO (mp): pre-processing and escaping
    val preprocessingFuture: Future[InterfaceTrees] =
      backend.preprocess(interfaces, conf, prefixes)
